text: Beatrice Cenci is a 1956 historical drama film directed by Riccardo Freda and starring Micheline Presle, Gino Cervi and Fausto Tozzi. ==Cast== ==Release== Beatrice Cenci was distributed theatrically in Italy by Cei-Incom on 6 September 1956. It grossed a total of 223,400,000 Italian lire domestically. == References == ===Bibliography=== * ==External links== * Category:1956 films Category:1950s historical drama films Category:Italian-language films Category:French films Category:French historical drama films Category:Italian films Category:Italian historical drama films Category:Films directed by Riccardo Freda Category:Films set in the 16th century Category:Films shot at Cinecittà Studios Category:Cultural depictions of Beatrice Cenci Category:1956 drama films
title: Beatrice Cenci (1956 film)
